body:
Hello everybody,



I have created a component that calculates the transient PMV from the radTempMtx output. I can visualize this transient comfort with the component "LadyBug Recolor Mesh". But I'm having trouble  to understand the order of the test points from the "Honeybee Indoor View Factor" component.



I have a matrix like a data tree list that represents the values of WindSpeed in the building, the problem is that I can't find the good order of the test points in the "Indoor View Factor Component". If I have this order I would can put my WindSpeed list in the good order and put it as the input of my transient PMV.



Can anyone explain me this ?



Thank you for your help.
topic: Order of the test points in the Honeybee Indoor View Factor Component
